itunes:title: Episode 639 - What's The Law When Pulled Over?
title: Episode 639 - What's The Law When Pulled Over?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Jesse Bright aka “The Original Uber Lawyer” to discuss his viral video where he was unlawfully stopped by a police officer due to his Uber passenger, Jesse weighs in on the US considering banning Tik ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Jesse Bright aka “The Original Uber Lawyer” to discuss his viral video where he was unlawfully stopped by a police officer due to his Uber passenger, Jesse weighs in on the US considering banning Tik Tok, we discuss “sun burn porn”, the importance of owning yaks, and he explains using his background in law why you don’t have to even speak a word to an officer if stopped at a police checkpoint.

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
